channel.name: LIMS Repo Update Order

step.name: accession_number
npid
step.script: tmp['data']['patient']['national_patient_id'] = validate(msg['PID']['PID.3']['PID.3.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: first name
step.script: tmp['data']['patient']['first_name'] = validate(msg['PID']['PID.5']['PID.5.2'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: middle name
step.script: tmp['data']['patient']['middle_name'] = validate(msg['PID']['PID.5']['PID.5.3'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: last name
step.script: tmp['data']['patient']['last_name'] = validate(msg['PID']['PID.5']['PID.5.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: dob
step.script: tmp['data']['patient']['date_of_birth'] = validate(msg['PID']['PID.7']['PID.7.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: gender
step.script: tmp['data']['patient']['gender'] = validate(msg['PID']['PID.8']['PID.8.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: specimen type
step.script: tmp['data']['sample_type'] = validate(msg['SPM']['SPM.4']['SPM.4.2'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: order timestamp
step.script: tmp['data']['date_time'] = validate(msg['OBR']['OBR.8']['OBR.8.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: sending facility
step.script: tmp['data']['sending_facility'] = validate(msg['MSH']['MSH.4']['MSH.4.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: receiving facility
step.script: tmp['data']['receiving_facility'] = validate(msg['MSH']['MSH.6']['MSH.6.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: test type
step.script: tmp['data']['test_type'] = validate(msg['OBR']['OBR.4']['OBR.4.2'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: who ordered fname
step.script: tmp['data']['who_order_test']['first_name'] = validate(msg['OBR']['OBR.16']['OBR.16.3'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: who ordered lname
step.script: tmp['data']['who_order_test']['last_name'] = validate(msg['OBR']['OBR.16']['OBR.16.2'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: who ordered id
step.script: tmp['data']['who_order_test']['id_number'] = validate(msg['OBR']['OBR.16']['OBR.16.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: accession_number
step.script: tmp['data']['_id'] = validate(msg['SPM']['SPM.2']['SPM.2.1'].toString(), '', new Array());

step.name: orderer
